verses.verse: Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to me, <S%H518>Though<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, yet my <S%H5315>mind<s%> could not be <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H7971>cast<s%> them out of my <S%H6440>sight,<s%> and let them <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>if<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H575>Where<s%> shall we <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth?<s%> then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> them, Thus <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> Such as are for <S%H4194>death,<s%> to <S%H4194>death;<s%> and such as are for the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and such as are for the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> to the <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and such as are for the <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> to the <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

And I will <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4940>kinds,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H2026>slay,<s%> and the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> to <S%H5498>tear,<s%> and the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> and <S%H7843>destroy.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>cause<s%> them to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H1558>because<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> for that <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

For <S%H4310>who<s%> shall have <S%H2550>pity<s%> on you, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> you? or who shall <S%H5493>go<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7592>ask<s%> how you <S%H7965>do?<s%>

You have <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you are <S%H3212>gone<s%> <S%H268>backward:<s%> therefore will I <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and <S%H7843>destroy<s%> you; I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> with <S%H5162>repenting.<s%>

And I will <S%H2219>fan<s%> them with a <S%H4214>fan<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> I will <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them of children, I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> my people <S%H5971><s%><S%H4480>since<s%> they <S%H7725>return<s%> not from their <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

Their <S%H490>widows<s%> are <S%H6105>increased<s%> to me above the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas:<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> on them <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of the <S%H970>young<s%> men a <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday:<s%> I have caused him to <S%H5307>fall<s%> on it <S%H6597>suddenly,<s%> and <S%H928>terrors<s%> on the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

She that has <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H535>languishes:<s%> she has <S%H5301>given<s%> up the <S%H5315>ghost;<s%> her <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>gone<s%> down while it was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3119>day:<s%> she has been <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded:<s%> and the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of them will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H188>Woe<s%> is me, my <S%H517>mother,<s%> that you have <S%H3205>borne<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7379>strife<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4066>contention<s%> to the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth!<s%> I have <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5383>lent<s%> on <S%H5383>usury,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> men have <S%H5383>lent<s%> to me on <S%H5383>usury;<s%> yet <S%H3605>every<s%> one of them does <S%H7043>curse<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>Truly<s%> <S%H3808><s%> it shall be <S%H2896>well<s%> with your <S%H8293>remnant;<s%> <S%H518>truly<s%> I will cause the <S%H341>enemy<s%> to <S%H6293>entreat<s%> you well in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> and in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction.<s%>
Shall <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7489>break<s%> the <S%H6828>northern<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> and the <S%H5178>steel?<s%>

Your <S%H2428>substance<s%> and your <S%H214>treasures<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H957>spoil<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4242>price,<s%> and that for <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2403>sins,<s%> even in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

And I will make you to <S%H5674>pass<s%> with your <S%H341>enemies<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> which you <S%H3045>know<s%> not: for a <S%H784>fire<s%> is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> which shall <S%H3344>burn<s%> on you.

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you <S%H3045>know:<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> me, and <S%H6485>visit<s%> me, and <S%H5358>revenge<s%> me of my <S%H7291>persecutors;<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> me not away in your <S%H750>long-suffering:<s%> <S%H639><s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that for your sake I have <S%H5375>suffered<s%> <S%H2781>rebuke.<s%>

Your <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H4672>found,<s%> and I did <S%H398>eat<s%> them; and your <S%H1697>word<s%> was to me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>rejoicing<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart:<s%> for I am <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

I <S%H3427>sat<s%> not in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of the <S%H7832>mockers,<s%> nor <S%H5937>rejoiced;<s%> I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H909>alone<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> for you have <S%H4390>filled<s%> me with <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> is my <S%H3511>pain<s%> <S%H5331>perpetual,<s%> and my <S%H4347>wound<s%> <S%H605>incurable,<s%> which <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed?<s%> will you be altogether to me as a <S%H391>liar,<s%> and as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that <S%H3808>fail?<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H7725>return,<s%> then will I <S%H7725>bring<s%> you <S%H7725>again,<s%> and you shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: and <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3318>take<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3368>precious<s%> from the <S%H2151>vile,<s%> you shall be as my <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> let them <S%H7725>return<s%> to you; but <S%H7725>return<s%> not you to them.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H2346>wall:<s%> and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> you, but they shall not <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against you: for I am with you to <S%H3467>save<s%> you and to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked,<s%> and I will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> you out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible.<s%>
